features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy

Gore-Tex Paclite® is a two-layer, unlined fabric: It's lighter and more breathable than traditional Gore-Tex, making it easy to pack and carry without limiting its ability to shed wet weather; Gore-Tex fabric is Guaranteed To Keep You Dry™
Interior storm flap features fabric behind the zipper to keep out the wind features fabric behind the zipper to keep out the wind
Pit Zip vents; Adjustable cuffs; Drawcord cinch at hem
Packs down into a zippered pocket
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
